700851f-a.text:
(1)
Decatur Avenue, south of, adjoining, and at the S.W. corner of E. 197th Street. The two frame houses bear numbers 2737 and 2739, and the 5-story building bears No. 364 E. 197th Street.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
Looking westward across the empty lot (lot 41) seen on the left in view 1. In the background appears the east wing and rear of a 6-story house bearing No. 2728 Marion Avenue.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.

700311f-a.text:
381 and 385 E. 197th Street, at, and adjoining the N.E. corner of Decatur Avenue, showing two boarded-up frame houses.
June 16, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
